sentences.en: Better an egg today than a pullet .
sentences.cn: 今天一个鸡蛋，胜过明天一只小母鸡。

sentences.en: Better an egg today than a pullet.
sentences.cn: 双语例句今天一个鸡蛋，胜过明天一只小母鸡。

sentences.en: The little pullet pushed through the crowded henhouse over to the door .
sentences.cn: 小母鸡艰难地走过拥挤鸡群走到门口。

trans.tran_en: a young chicken that is in its first year of laying eggs
